websockets

Class WebsocketServerEvents

  • java.lang.Object
    • websockets.WebsocketServerEvents

  • @WebSocket
public class WebsocketServerEvents
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Lasse Steenbock Vestergaard This class is responsible for handling all events relating to the websocket server

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      WebsocketServerController ctrl 
      org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void handleClose(int statusCode, java.lang.String reason)
      Handles closing down a specific client connection, and removes the client from the list of clients
      void handleConnect(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session)
      Handles new client connections, and adding the client to a list of clients, so that we can send messages to it later
      void handleError(java.lang.Throwable error)
      Handling connection errors and writes the to the console
      void handleMessage(java.lang.String message)
      Handles incoming messages, and passes them on to the Processing sketch's websocket event method

    • Method Detail

      • handleConnect

        @OnWebSocketConnect
public void handleConnect(org.eclipse.jetty.websocket.api.Session session)
        Handles new client connections, and adding the client to a list of clients, so that we can send messages to it later
        Parameters:
        session - The connection session between the server and a specific client (not all clients!)

      • handleClose

        @OnWebSocketClose
public void handleClose(int statusCode,
                                          java.lang.String reason)
        Handles closing down a specific client connection, and removes the client from the list of clients
        Parameters:
        statusCode - Reason code for closing the connection
        reason - Description of close down reason

      • handleMessage

        @OnWebSocketMessage
public void handleMessage(java.lang.String message)
        Handles incoming messages, and passes them on to the Processing sketch's websocket event method
        Parameters:
        message - The incoming message

      • handleError

        @OnWebSocketError
public void handleError(java.lang.Throwable error)
        Handling connection errors and writes the to the console
        Parameters:
        error - The error that occurred
